body_html:
You can try bazel build -s //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo --verbose_failures > output.txt 2>&1 which will redirect all output to the file.

You shouldn't need to use sudo for building if your Bazel is installed properly -- have you been using it the entire time?
body_text:
You can try bazel build -s //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo --verbose_failures > output.txt 2>&1 which will redirect all output to the file.
You shouldn't need to use sudo for building if your Bazel is installed properly -- have you been using it the entire time?
body:
You can try `bazel build -s //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo --verbose_failures > output.txt 2>&1` which will redirect all output to the file.

You shouldn't need to use sudo for building if your Bazel is installed properly -- have you been using it the entire time?
